snippet.title: Kolumno - Launch trailer (PC, iOS and Android)
snippet.description:
Don't let yourself be fooled by its minimalist looks, Kolumno is one of the most elegant and challenging games in recent time. 
-Steam (Windows & macOS): https://store.steampowered.com/app/970710/kolumno/
- ich.io (Windows & macOS): https://devilishgames.itch.io/kolumno
- iOS (iPhone & iPad): https://itunes.apple.com/es/app/id1440050196
- Android (Mobile, tablet & Android TV): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.devilishgames.kolumno
